column4: hi, i have kubuntu hardy installed. my computer has 4gb of ram (bios reports so). how come free -m does not report 4 gb. !pastebin is here: http://pastebin.com/d45696b63
It is in use.. if you need to see the 4 gigs free .. install the server kernel
so, if i understand this right, ubuntu is using it, just displaying it incorrectly?
the desktop kernel will only show you 3.4 or so...  but it is not lost..
